session_info.name: MOXAA - Plenary Oral Session, Circular and Linear Colliders

papers.title: International Linear Collider, Latest Status towards Realization
authors: This presentation describes the International Linear Collider (ILC)
an e+ and e- collider based on the superconducting linear accelerator with a center of mass energy of 500 GeV in the first stage
upgradeable to 1 TeV. According to the statement of the Science Council of Japan
and Sports) and the Japanese government have investigated the feasibility of the ILC project
not only from the scientific view
and sociological points of view. The latest status of the project will be presented.
